front.title: Cryptographic Algorithms, Use, & Implementation Requirments for TCP Authentication Option

abstract.t: The TCP Authentication Option, TCP-AO, relies on security algorithms to provide authentication between two end-points. There are many such algorithms available, and two TCP-AO systems cannot interoperate unless they are using the same algorithm(s). This document specifies the algorithms and attributes that can be used in TCP-AO's current manual keying mechanism.
